name: Yukidama -- trial version
description:
Yukidama -- trial version Description

Yukidama is a 2D platformer game which features an innovative line-drawing mechanic and cute art style. It is part of the Indie Prize Showcase in Casual Connect Asia 2016.

Currently, there are five levels available in the trial version which consist Chapter 1.The story takes place in oriental fantasy mountain setting.

One day, Snow Queen's bag of magic snowflakes breaks and they end up all over the mountain. Yukidama, a snow spirit in the form of a bunny, is sent to retrieve the magic snowflakes.

The player's role is to guide the bunny. Player need to help the bunny to dodge the danger along the paths, collect as many magic snowflakes as possible, and get to the goal safely.
